long_description: The Serfas FP-200 floor pump offers quick, easy tire inflation thanks to an integrated pump head that fits both Schrader and Presta valves, and can pump up to 160 psi. Plastic pump head fits both Presta and Schrader valves; a solid valve seal is achieved with a quick flick of the pump head's plastic lever. Large, top-mounted analog gauge with psi and bar index is easy to read. Pump head keeper helps keep the mechanism clean and the extra-long hose in place for transport and storage. Features a durable metal barrel and base for lasting use; ergonomic plastic handle offers a comfortable grip. The Serfas FP-200 floor pump also comes with ball and bladder needles, which fit neatly into their own holder.
short_description: The Serfas FP-200 floor pump offers quick, easy tire inflation thanks to an integrated pump head that fits both Schrader and Presta valves, and can pump up to 160 psi.
